stable.title: ImageGlass 9.3 – Hotfix 2
stable.description:
Fixed an issue where ImageGlass could not open the image when the "Use Explorer sort order" setting is disabled.

ImageGlass 9.3 – 15 Years of Open, Evolving Image Viewing

This release marks the 15th anniversary of ImageGlass, introducing full support for File Explorer sort order, a self-contained deployment that eliminates the need for the .NET Desktop Runtime, and new features including Live Photo (JPEG) playback and color inversion.

kobe.title: Announcing ImageGlass 9.3 – 15 Years of Open, Evolving Image Viewing
kobe.description: This release marks the 15th anniversary of ImageGlass, introducing full support for File Explorer sort order, a self-contained deployment that eliminates the need for the .NET Desktop Runtime, and new features including Live Photo (JPEG) playback and color inversion.
